Edges-Legendary -- Male Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d4 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Ailin': -1 vs. fatigue; critical failure inflicts Ailin'+
Grit: Reduces penalties vs. fear by 2
Guts: May reroll Vigor vs. fear
True Grit: Ignores penalties vs. fear, may reroll fear effects
Skills (20 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Gambling: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Shooting: (agi) d10
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d10 Stealth: (agi) d6
Focus: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Skill Notes: Reputation: +2 Intimidation (bad reputation) or may reroll Persuasion (good reputation) with those who have heard stories
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 18; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (10 points): Behold A Pale Horse; Damned; Fast As Lightning; Grit; Guts; Quick; Reputation; Right Hand Of The Devil; Trademark Weapon (Derringer); True Grit Hindrances: Ailin'; Stubborn; Trouble Magnet+ Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Behold APale Horse: Mount is a Wild Card with Fearless and Danger Sense features
Damned: Will return as Harrowed if killed
Stubborn: Never admits error
Trouble Magnet+: Always suffers random consequences
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 1 Toughness: 5 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: Small Native Shield Weapons: Billy Club; Dagger; Derringer (+1 2d4 R3"); Knife (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed
Combat Notes:
Trademark Weapon (Derringer): +1 attack and Parry with Derringer
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Fast As Lightning: May take 4 actions at -6 each
Quick: May redraw Action Cards lower than 6
Right Hand Of The Devil: Trademark weapon does extra die of damage
